embed.description: Hello All, Surely I can't be the only one with this thought. We are currently nearing the end of Season 5. That's 5 years of League of Legends. In these 5 years I'm sure a vast majority of us have run out of uses for our IP.

replies.body: SO you've bought every single champ?
I've been playing since season 1 and honestly, it's not that hard to get every champ.

> [{quoted}](name=DW Aatrox,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xfEj2ilh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-09-21T23:09:51.467+0000)
>
> I've been playing since season 1 and honestly, it's not that hard to get every champ.

wow! That is amazing!
But I do totally agree with you, there should be a new way to "waste" you IP.
After you get 20 rune pages, buy all the good runes and have changed your name at least 4 times IP loses it's charm you know?
